meanings.definition: A type of vitamin A compound used in skincare products.
meanings.sent1: I bought a new cream with retinols for my skin.
meanings.sent2: The retinols in this serum help reduce wrinkles.
meanings.sent3: My friend joked that she could smell the retinols from a mile away.
meanings.sent4: Her glowing skin was like a canvas painted with retinols.
meanings.sent5: The retinols worked wonders on her complexion, making it radiant.

meanings.sent1: The skincare aisle had various retinols on display.
meanings.sent2: She stocked up on retinols for her beauty routine.
meanings.sent3: The retinols seemed to multiply on the shelf overnight!
meanings.sent4: The jar contained a treasure trove of retinols for her skin.
meanings.sent5: The retinols in her collection were her secret to youthful skin.
